name.desc: Name of the icon, following Quasar convention

color.desc: Color name for component from the Quasar Color Palette

size.desc: Size in CSS units, including unit name

left.desc: Apply a standard margin on the left side. Useful if icon is on the right side of something.

right.desc: Apply a standard margin on the right side. Useful if icon is on the left side of something.
